subject: To Anthony
body: Thank you for your email, received..

subject: Re: To Anthony
body:
Dear Friend ,



 Thank you so much my dear friend for your humble waiting for my
comprehensive reply, Once again I am Mr. JOSIP ROZMAN from Russia with
Croatian ancestral descent, but we are all Russians per say, as my great
grandparents are Croatians. Going straight without much ado, I consider
securing my fortune into funding investing in stable and
established industries that have a proven track record rather than
speculative or high-risk sectors. This can help ensure a more reliable
return on the investment



With my research and due diligence, thoroughly researched on your Country's
political stability,economic conditions, business regulations, and
investment climate, I understand the local laws, tax policies, and
restrictions on foreign investments. I also understand that no
investment is risk-free, therefore I implore your idea and advice specific
to your circumstances, help assess potential risk, and provide guidance on
suitable investment opportunities in your region.


Because of the isolated state of this country to business opportunities
here in Russia, yes we are russians, but we are not true russians when it's
come to politics and otherwise, including my present state in the Country,
which ppromt me to have my fund secured, while i am following the situation
here with some officials. Can I trust you with my fund, even though I don't
really have a choice?. I have decided to secure my investment capital into
a good investment idea you may share with me in your region, that will give
me a sense of direction of where to be after the government here will rule
in my favor.


 My  ideas cited to Real Estate, Renewal Energy, and Manufacturing etc, or
in your field / area of specialization, or to set up a separate Joint
Venture company account. If you consider my ideas practical and potential
in your region, or you have other investment ideas to recommend, please
share it with me for us to arrive at a particular area of investment. I
want to know your idea as to what is best for investment funding in
your region with a clear feasibility study. I will welcome your advice and
recommendations in good faith, two ideas are better than one.


 I look forward to a direct partnership with you to manage my proposed
investment funding in your capability. Your experience and good
understanding of the business environment will be an added advantage. The
current situation in my country warrants that I leave with my family. I am
hoping that all arrangements about the investment including the transfer of
required funds are finalized within the next month.


I will be expecting to hear from you soon with your recommendations and
response to my proposition for investment in your country.


Regards,


Mr. Josip Rozman



Re: Hello Dear friend,
Inbox
Search for all messages with label Inbox
Remove label Inbox from this conversation
jo08331@***.com
11:17â€¯AM (2 hours ago)
to me



Hello Mr. Josip R.,

It's a pleasure to hear from you and thank you for considering my country
as a potential place for your investment. The news about the government's
decision to improve foreign investment is indeed exciting.

Could you please provide more details about the nature of your investment?
What kind of business are you planning to invest in? And how do you think
this will benefit our economy?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.
Best wishes,
Anthony

subject: Re: To Anthony
body:
Hello there,

Thank you so much for your email. I appreciate you taking the time to reach out. Could you please provide more details about the subject matter? I'm eager to learn more.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Anthony

subject: Re: To Anthony
body:
Hello Mr. Josip Rozman,

I am delighted to receive your message and I appreciate your interest in investing in my country. The prospect of enhancing foreign investment is indeed thrilling.

Could you kindly elaborate more on the type of investment you are considering? What sort of business are you planning to invest in? And how do you envision this will contribute positively to our economy?

Eagerly awaiting your response.

Best wishes,
Anthony

subject: Re: To Anthony
body:

subject: Re: To Anthony
body:
Hello Mr. Josip Rozman,

Thank you for your detailed message and for considering me as a potential partner in your investment plans. I'm flattered by your trust, even though we haven't met in person.

I understand that you're looking to invest in stable industries with a proven track record. That's indeed a wise decision. Real Estate and Renewable Energy are both sectors that have shown consistent growth over the years.

However, I must admit that I'm not an expert in these fields, but I can certainly do some research and provide you with some general information about the current market trends in my region. Would that be helpful?

Also, could you please tell me more about the Joint Venture company account you mentioned? How would this work exactly? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Anthony

subject: Re: To Anthony
body:
Hello Athony,

Antony English of Freedom Won on making green energy more accessible in
South Africa...

 Thank you for your email, you know I do not have all the time and
privilege to make use of the computer, because I have been wiretapped and I
mind my treading very carefully, to avoid anything that will affect my
unfinished case in the court. Since this fund is very important to me, I
will take all the means to make sure I invest or non-investment with you.
In order to continue, I have drafted  a memorandum of understanding that
will hold us together throughout the process, all you have to do is to go
through it and make your obsessions, changes or corrections.

Whatever you are doing, tell me the legal means to receive the money that
will be okay for you , since I am going to be here throughout the process.





                                         CONTRACTUAL AGREEMENT FOR
RECEIVING OF FUNDS


The Party (A): Josip Rozman of
( Russia ).


The Party (B):  Anthony of
( South Africa ).


WHEREAS IT STATE AS FOLLOWS:

(1.a)  The Party (A) is a citizen of ( Russia ) who proposes the fund
amounting to USD30, 000, 000.00 ( Thirty Million United States Dollars)
only,  to be received by party (B) who is a citizen of (  South Africa   ).
Under the agreement of the both parties to invest the fund under the sole
control of the party (B).  (1.b) The Party (B) is a citizen of the
South Africa:  NOW THEREFORE, in consideration for the mutual covenants and
benefits herein contained, the Parties have agreed as follows.

(2) SHARING  RATIO:
 The party (A)  hereby said that Party (B) shall receive commission at the
rate of 50% (Fifty Percent) of the funds.
The party (A) hereby agrees that the remaining 50% (Fifty Percent) belongs
to Party (A) and shall return to the Party (B) custody/account till the
party (A) makes his way to meet with party (B).  The both parties hereby
agreed any expenses in the process of the transactions will be paid back
from the total fund at the rate of 5% (Five Percent) by the party involved.

The party (A), under the principles of utmost good faith and trust hereby
promise that upon the receipt of the said fund, that the party (B) must
abide by the sharing ratio as stated above.

Both parties should always stand at each other's assistance as brothers'
keepers. In consideration of the mutual promises set forth herein, the
party (A) covenants and agrees that it shall uphold all agreements stated
in this document and not terminate the contract until all the terms have
been met. The party (B) covenants and agrees to uphold all agreements
stated in this document and not terminate the contract until all the terms
have been met.

This Contract may not be modified in any manner unless in writing and
signed by both Parties. This document and any attachments hereto constitute
the entire agreement between the Parties. This Contract shall be binding
upon the Parties, their successors, heirs and assigns and shall be enforced
under the international and global laws of contract, as stated by
International norms.

 (3) DE-FENCE AND INDEMNIFICATION:

The party (B) agreed, at its sole expense, to defend  the party (B), and to
indemnify and hold the party (B) harmless from any claims or suits by a
third party against.
The party (B) or any liabilities or judgments based thereon , either
arising from the party (B)'s performance of service for the party (A)
 under this C.A.T.F or arising from any party (B) action which result from
the party (B) performance of the services under this Contractual Agreement
of the Transaction of Funds (C.A.T.F). All words in the C.A.T.F are
singular, shall also include the plural and vice versa and words in the
male gender shall be constructed in this C.A.T.F to include the female and
neuter gender.

This C.A.T.F is made in two (2) copies one (1) copy each to the two (2)
parties shall be deemed an original, but all of which together shall
constitute one and the same C.A.T.F.
This agreement is consciously and willingly reached, signed and delivered
between both as under-mentioned.
Best Regard

Josip Rozman of Russia.
Party (A) sign:...

Anthony of (  South Africa  )
Party (B) sign:..

subject: Re: To Anthony
body:
Hello Josip Rozman,

Thank you for your detailed email. It's quite interesting to see how you've outlined the process of receiving funds and the sharing ratio. I must say, it's a unique approach.

However, I have a few questions that I hope you can clarify for me. Firstly, could you explain more about this fund? Where does it originate from and why is it being transferred? 

Secondly, in terms of the sharing ratio, how did we arrive at a fifty percent split? Is there any room for negotiation on this?

Lastly, regarding the expenses in the process of transfer, could you provide an estimate of what these might be? And why would they be paid back from the total fund?

I'm looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Anthony

subject: Re: To Anthony
body:
Hello there! I hope you're having a great day. I'm really interested in learning more about what you have to offer. Could you please provide me with some more details?

Best wishes,
Anthony

subject: Re: To Anthony
body:
Hello Josip,

Thank you for your detailed email. I must say, it's quite a lot to take in! I'm not the sharpest tool in the shed, so bear with me as I try to understand everything.

From what I gather, you're proposing an investment opportunity involving a large sum of money. That sounds exciting! But could you please explain more about this fund? Where does it come from and why is it important to you?

Also, I noticed that there's a sharing ratio mentioned. Does this mean we'll be splitting the profits 50/50? And what does it mean when you say any expenses will be paid back at a rate of Five Percent by the party involved?

I'm sorry if my questions seem silly. As I said, I'm not very good with these things. But your proposal sounds interesting and I'd like to learn more.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Anthony

subject: Re: To Anthony
body:
* Does this mean we'll be splitting the profits 50/50? Yes!

* And what does it mean when you say any expenses will be paid back at a
rate of Five Percent by the party involved?
  That simply means, at the process of the transition of the fund, any
occurrence should be taken care of by the party in position.

Hope that solve the questions
Regards

Josip

subject: Re: To Anthony
body:
Hello Josip,

Thank you for your quick response. I appreciate the clarification about splitting the profits and the expenses being paid back at a rate of Five Percent by the party involved.

Could you please elaborate more on what kind of occurrences might be taken care of by the party in position? Also, could you provide some examples of potential expenses that might come up during this process?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Anthony

subject: Re: To Anthony
body:
This is simple, I am seeking your partnership, and your Country has been
immensely, you know, here is Russia, I am confiding in you because at this
point I really need to do something to secure my money before it is too
late for me.
The main reason is to make sure that you have this fund under your Custody,
while I will go on with the case I have with the ministry of works here. I
have told you about all these, can you tell me a little little about you, i
am an old man, and I would like to know a little about your background.
Best Regards

Josip

subject: Re: To Anthony
body:
Hello Josip,

It's a pleasure to hear from you. I'm intrigued by your situation and would like to know more about it. Can you tell me more about the case you have with the ministry of works? Also, how did you come across my contact information?

I must say, I'm just an ordinary person living a simple life. I enjoy reading books, taking long walks in the park, and spending time with my family. 

Looking forward to hearing more from you.

Best wishes,
Anthony
